${modID}:Targeting Strike.NAME: Targeting Strike
${modID}:Targeting Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Lock-On+ to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Looting Strike.NAME: Looting Strike
${modID}:Looting Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card, then discard !M! card.
${modID}:Looting Strike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards, then discard !M! cards.

${modID}:Retaining Strike.NAME: Retaining Strike
${modID}:Retaining Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose !M! card to Retain this turn.
${modID}:Retaining Strike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose !M! cards to Retain this turn.

${modID}:Exhausting Strike.NAME: Exhausting Strike
${modID}:Exhausting Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust up to !M! cards from your hand.

${modID}:Insightful Strike.NAME: Insightful Strike
${modID}:Insightful Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.

${modID}:Scraping Strike.NAME: Scraping Strike
${modID}:Scraping Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all cards drawn this way that do not cost 0.

${modID}:Empty Strike.NAME: Empty Strike
${modID}:Empty Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exit your Stance.

${modID}:Cunning Strike.NAME: Cunning Strike
${modID}:Cunning Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 Shiv into your hand.
${modID}:Cunning Strike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 Shiv+ into your hand.

${modID}:Toxic Strike.NAME: Toxic Strike
${modID}:Toxic Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

${modID}:0ch0 Form.NAME: 0ch0 F0rm
${modID}:0ch0 Form.DESCRIPTION: The first cost 0 card you play each turn is played twice.
${modID}:0ch0 Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first 2 cost 0 cards you play each turn are played twice.

${modID}:Cunning Defend.NAME: Cunning Defend
${modID}:Cunning Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 Shiv into your hand.
${modID}:Cunning Defend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add 1 Shiv+ into your hand.

${modID}:Empty Defend.NAME: Empty Defend
${modID}:Empty Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exit your Stance.

${modID}:Exhausting Defend.NAME: Exhausting Defend
${modID}:Exhausting Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust up to !M! cards from your hand.

${modID}:Insightful Defend.NAME: Insightful Defend
${modID}:Insightful Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.

${modID}:Looting Defend.NAME: Looting Defend
${modID}:Looting Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card, then discard !M! card.
${modID}:Looting Defend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards, then discard !M! cards.

${modID}:Retaining Defend.NAME: Retaining Defend
${modID}:Retaining Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Choose !M! card to Retain this turn.
${modID}:Retaining Defend.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Choose !M! cards to Retain this turn.

${modID}:Scraping Defend.NAME: Scraping Defend
${modID}:Scraping Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all cards drawn this way that do not cost 0.

${modID}:Toxic Defend.NAME: Toxic Defend
${modID}:Toxic Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Chimera Form.NAME: Chimera Form
${modID}:Chimera Form.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain 1 Strength, 1 Dexterity, 1 Orb slot, and 1 Mantra.
${modID}:Chimera Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Strength, 1 Dexterity, 1 Orb slot, and 1 Mantra.

${modID}:Foreign Powers.NAME: Foreign Powers
${modID}:Foreign Powers.DESCRIPTION: For each color, add a random Power card of that color into your hand. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:On A Roll.NAME: On A Roll
${modID}:On A Roll.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack, gain !M! temporary Strength and !M! temporary Dexterity.

${modID}:Havoc.NAME: Havoc
${modID}:Havoc.DESCRIPTION: Scry 1. NL Play the top card of your draw pile and Exhaust it.

${modID}:Sever Soul.NAME: Sever Soul
${modID}:Sever Soul.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all non-Attack cards in your hand. NL Gain 1 Mantra for each card Exhausted. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Bane.NAME: Bane
${modID}:Bane.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Poison, deal !D! damage again.

${modID}:Barrage.NAME: Barrage
${modID}:Barrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each Channeled Orb.

${modID}:Heatsinks.NAME: Heatsinks
${modID}:Heatsinks.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Power card, draw !M! card.
${modID}:Heatsinks.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Power card, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Hello World.NAME: Hello World
${modID}:Hello World.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Common card into your hand.
${modID}:Hello World.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a random Common card into your hand.

${modID}:Storm.NAME: Storm
${modID}:Storm.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a Power card, Channel 1 Lightning.

${modID}:Streamline.NAME: Streamline
${modID}:Streamline.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play this card, reduce its cost by 1 for this combat.

${modID}:Scrape.NAME: Scrape
${modID}:Scrape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard all cards drawn this way that do not cost 0.

${modID}:Capacitor.NAME: Capacitor
${modID}:Capacitor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Orb slots. NL Gain 1 Dexterity.

${modID}:Consume.NAME: Consume
${modID}:Consume.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Focus. NL Gain 2 Strength. NL Lose 1 Orb slot.

${modID}:Go for the Eyes.NAME: Go for the Eyes
${modID}:Go for the Eyes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak, otherwise apply !M! Vulnerable.

${modID}:Rainbow.NAME: Rainbow
${modID}:Rainbow.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Lightning, 1 Frost, and 1 Dark. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Fission.NAME: Fission
${modID}:Fission.DESCRIPTION: Remove all your Orbs. NL Gain [B] and draw 1 card for each Orb removed. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Fission.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke all your Orbs. NL Gain [B] and draw 1 card for each Orb Evoked. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Static Discharge.NAME: Static Discharge
${modID}:Static Discharge.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff for the first time each turn, Channel !M! Lightning.
${modID}:Static Discharge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you apply a debuff for the first time each turn, Channel !M! Lightning.

${modID}:Swivel.NAME: Swivel
${modID}:Swivel.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL The next attack you play costs 0.

${modID}:Fasting.NAME: Fasting
${modID}:Fasting.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain 1 Focus. NL Gain 1 less Energy at the start of each turn.

${modID}:Study.NAME: Study
${modID}:Study.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Focus. NL At the end of your turn, shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.

${modID}:Deus Ex Machina.NAME: Deus Ex Machina
${modID}:Deus Ex Machina.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, add !M! Miracles into your hand. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Rushdown.NAME: Rushdown
${modID}:Rushdown.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change Stances for the first time each turn, draw 2 cards.

${modID}:Devotion.NAME: Devotion
${modID}:Devotion.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 3 Mantra.
${modID}:Devotion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, gain 3 Mantra.

${modID}:Pray.NAME: Pray
${modID}:Pray.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Mantra. NL Channel 1 Frost. NL Shuffle an Insight into your draw pile.

${modID}:Envenom.NAME: Envenom
${modID}:Envenom.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Poison.

${modID}:Tools of the Trade.NAME: Tools of the Trade
${modID}:Tools of the Trade.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and discard 1 card.

${modID}:Doppelganger.NAME: Doppelganger
${modID}:Doppelganger.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw X+1 cards and gain X+1 Energy. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Doppelganger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw X+2 cards and gain X+2 Energy. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Prepared.NAME: Prepared
${modID}:Prepared.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Discard !M! card.
${modID}:Prepared.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Discard !M! cards.

${modID}:Sneaky Strike.NAME: Sneaky Strike
${modID}:Sneaky Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have ${modID}:Milled a card this turn, this costs 0.

${modID}:A Thousand Cuts.NAME: A Thousand Cuts
${modID}:A Thousand Cuts.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Wraith Form.NAME: Wraith Form
${modID}:Wraith Form.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain 2 Intangible. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 Dexterity.
${modID}:Wraith Form.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Intangible. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 Dexterity.

${modID}:Darkness.NAME: Darkness
${modID}:Darkness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Dark. NL Trigger the passive ability of all Dark orbs.

${modID}:Master Reality.NAME: Master Reality
${modID}:Master Reality.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a card is created during combat, Upgrade it.

${modID}:Perseverance.NAME: Perseverance
${modID}:Perseverance.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. When Retained, increase its Block by !M!.

${modID}:Strike for One.NAME: Strike for One
${modID}:Strike for One.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return !M! random cost 0 card from your discard pile into your hand.
${modID}:Strike for One.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return !M! random cost 0 cards from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:Defend for One.NAME: Defend for One
${modID}:Defend for One.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put !M! random cost 0 card from your discard pile into your hand.
${modID}:Defend for One.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put !M! random cost 0 cards from your discard pile into your hand.

${modID}:Infernal Blade.NAME: Infernal Blade
${modID}:Infernal Blade.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Attack cards to add into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Infernal Blade.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Attack cards to add into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:Distraction.NAME: Distraction
${modID}:Distraction.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Skill cards to add into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Distraction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Skill cards to add into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:White Noise.NAME: White Noise
${modID}:White Noise.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random Power cards to add into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:White Noise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 Power cards to add into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

${modID}:Setup.NAME: Setup
${modID}:Setup.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL It costs 0 until played.

${modID}:Magnetism.NAME: Magnetism
${modID}:Magnetism.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random Colorless card into your hand.

${modID}:Mind Blast.NAME: Mind Blast
${modID}:Mind Blast.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your draw pile.

${modID}:Claw.NAME: Claw
${modID}:Claw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase the damage of ALL cost 0 Attacks by !M! this combat.

${modID}:Infinite Blades.NAME: Infinite Blades
${modID}:Infinite Blades.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Shiv into your hand. NL Whenever you are attacked, deal 3 damage back.
${modID}:Infinite Blades.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a Shiv into your hand. NL Whenever you are attacked, deal 5 damage back.

${modID}:Choke.NAME: Choke
${modID}:Choke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play a card this turn, the enemy loses !M! HP.

${modID}:Wild Strike.NAME: Wild Strike
${modID}:Wild Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a Wound into your hand.

${modID}:Dropkick.NAME: Dropkick
${modID}:Dropkick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Vulnerable, draw 1 card.

${modID}:Combustive Fumes.NAME: Combustive Fumes
${modID}:Combustive Fumes.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose 1 HP and apply !M! Poison to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Intimidate.NAME: Intimidate
${modID}:Intimidate.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Evolved Firebreathing.NAME: Evolved Firebreathing
${modID}:Evolved Firebreathing.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, deal 6 damage to ALL enemies and draw !M! card.
${modID}:Evolved Firebreathing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, deal 6 damage to ALL enemies and draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Metallic Rupture.NAME: Metallic Rupture
${modID}:Metallic Rupture.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block. NL Whenever you lose HP from a card, gain !${modID}:S! Strength.

${modID}:Deadly Poison.NAME: Deadly Poison
${modID}:Deadly Poison.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Poison. NL If this card is ${modID}:Milled, apply !M! Poison to a random enemy.

${modID}:Tactician.NAME: Tactician
${modID}:Tactician.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is ${modID}:Milled, NL gain [G].
${modID}:Tactician.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is ${modID}:Milled, NL gain [G] [G].

${modID}:Reflex.NAME: Reflex
${modID}:Reflex.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If this card is ${modID}:Milled, draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Weave.NAME: Weave
${modID}:Weave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you ${modID}:Mill a card, return this from the discard pile to your hand.

${modID}:Follow-Up.NAME: Follow-Up
${modID}:Follow-Up.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the last card played this combat was an Attack, draw 2 cards.

${modID}:Berserk.NAME: Berserk
${modID}:Berserk.DESCRIPTION: Enter Wrath. NL At the start of your turn, gain [R].
${modID}:Berserk.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Enter Wrath. NL At the start of your turn, gain [R].

${modID}:Like Water.NAME: Like Water
${modID}:Like Water.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you are in Calm or have a Frost Channeled, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Exploit Pain.NAME: Exploit Pain
${modID}:Exploit Pain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each debuff on the enemy.

${modID}:Storm of Steel.NAME: Storm of Steel
${modID}:Storm of Steel.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Add 1 Shiv into your hand for each card discarded.
${modID}:Storm of Steel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Add 1 Shiv+ into your hand for each card discarded.

${modID}:Targeting Defend.NAME: Targeting Defend
${modID}:Targeting Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Lock-On+ to ALL enemies.

${modID}:Catalyst.NAME: Catalyst
${modID}:Catalyst.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's Poison. NL Apply 99 ${modID}:Lock-On+. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Catalyst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Triple the enemy's Poison. NL Apply 99 ${modID}:Lock-On+. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Pressure Points.NAME: Pressure Points
${modID}:Pressure Points.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Mark. NL Apply !${modID}:LockOn! ${modID}:Lock-On+. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Mark.

${modID}:Eviscerate.NAME: Eviscerate
${modID}:Eviscerate.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less [G] NL for each card ${modID}:Milled this turn. NL Deal !D! damage 3 times.

${modID}:Dark Embrace.NAME: Dark Embrace
${modID}:Dark Embrace.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, NL draw 1 card.

${modID}:Exploit Weakness.NAME: Exploit Weakness
${modID}:Exploit Weakness.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. NL Gain !B! Block for each debuff on the enemy.

${modID}:Nirvana.NAME: Nirvana
${modID}:Nirvana.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you ${modID}:Mill a card, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Sadistic Defend.NAME: Sadistic Defend
${modID}:Sadistic Defend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gains additional Block equal to the total number of debuffs on enemies.

${modID}:Sadistic Strike.NAME: Sadistic Strike
${modID}:Sadistic Strike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to the total number of debuffs on enemies.
